configuration

Class Datei

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.Datei

  • public class Datei
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Datei. Elements from konfiguration.xml are loaded into here, into variables defined acc. to xml tag. Class for Tags konfiguration->input->datei
